Docs.summary: Creates a new instance of using the specified connection string and path to the topic. Use this overload only when the connection string does not use the property.
Docs.remarks: This method should only be used with a connection string that has namespace level authentication because the connection string supplied should not have entity level information associated with it.
Docs.exception: Thrown when the format of the parameters is incorrect.

Public Shared Function FormatTransferDeadLetterPath (topicPath As String) As String

Docs.summary: A utility method that, given the topic path and subscription name, forms a full path that points to the dead letter queue of the topic's transfer topic.
Docs.returns: Returns a representing a full path that points to the dead letter queue of the transfer topic of the specified topic. This path can be used in receiver creation or in URI formation (such as a REST URI).

Docs.summary: Peeks a BrokeredMessage from current queue/topic.
Docs.returns: return the peeked BrokeredMessage. A null is return if peek operation cannot obtain the message within .
Docs.remarks: A Null can be return by this API if operation exceeded the timeout specified, or the operations succeeded but there are no more messages to be received.

Docs.exception: Thrown when operation times out. Timeout period is initialized through the to avoid this exception if timeout value is relatively low.
Thrown if the has already been sent by a or once already.
Thrown if the client entity has been closed or aborted.
Thrown if there is an I/O or security error.
Thrown when an error occurs during serialization or deserialization.
Thrown if the topic does not exist.
Thrown if there is a messaging error.
